title: Rooftop Duel

controls: W / Right Mouse : JumpHold E / Left Mouse : AimRelease E / Release Left-Mouse : Shoot
I : JumpHold O : AimRelease O : Shoot
content.howToPlay:
Once the round loads, both ragdoll fighters try to balance on a rooftop. Tap jump, hold to aim, then let go to shoot. Every shot packs recoil, so a blast can rescue you from the edge or fling you into mid-air.

Floaty jumps give you a moment to dodge an incoming bullet, or if you mistime things, you'll sail straight into the abyss. If you stay up while your opponent falls, you win the round, collect coins, and head back to the shop for an even sillier weapon before the next rooftop showdown.
content.developer: Rooftop Duel is cooked up by FreezeNova, the studio behind a stack of popular unblocked ragdoll games like Soccer Random Pro.

fullContent: Homeâ€º ShootingRooftop DuelBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCan you handle a rooftop shoot-out with gravity, ragdoll limbs, and a toybox of overpowered weapons? The recoil is wild here. Rooftop Duel piles all the goofy physics of classic ragdoll games. You'll try to knock off your opponent on a city rooftop. Press play and you hop straight into a duel; There are no downloads, no sign-ups; just jump, aim, and laugh as you and your opponent rocket each other off narrow city rooftops.Grab a friend or fly solo, hit Play, and see how long you can stay on the roof. Just don't blame the game when you're laughing too hard to aim straight!Let's get to the controls and game modes together:ControlsPlayer 1W / Right Mouse : JumpHold E / Left Mouse : AimRelease E / Release Left-Mouse : ShootPlayer 2I : JumpHold O : AimRelease O : ShootHow to Play Rooftop DuelOnce the round loads, both ragdoll fighters try to balance on a rooftop. Tap jump, hold to aim, then let go to shoot. Every shot packs recoil, so a blast can rescue you from the edge or fling you into mid-air.Floaty jumps give you a moment to dodge an incoming bullet, or if you mistime things, you'll sail straight into the abyss. If you stay up while your opponent falls, you win the round, collect coins, and head back to the shop for an even sillier weapon before the next rooftop showdown.Game ModesRooftop Duel has three main game modes that offer different ways to play depending on whether you're playing alone or with a friend.2 Player Mode: local multiplayer mode where two players share the same keyboard. Each player uses their own set of keys to jump and shoot. First player uses W and E while the second uses I and O keys. The round continues until one player knocks the other off the rooftop. You'll play 5 rounds to complete a match. This mode is only available on devices with a keyboard, so it is best played on a laptop or desktop. If you're using a mobile, try other modes instead.Missions Mode: a series of short levels, each with a specific objective. It's a good place to start if you want to get used to the controls, learn how different weapons behave, and see new rooftops each round.Survivor Mode: the goal is to stay alive for as long as possible. You'll face a continuous wave of enemies. The difficulty increases the longer you last. This mode requires a bit quicker reactions and good control compared to other modes. It's recommended to unlock more powerful weapons before playing, as basic gear can make it difficult to survive for long.DeveloperRooftop Duel is cooked up by FreezeNova, the studio behind a stack of popular unblocked ragdoll games like Soccer Random Pro.More Gun Games OnlineIf you're hooked on floppy firefights, try Total Recoil next. In this game, you're a soldier fighting off waves of angry robots in a factory. Each time you shoot, recoil makes you bounce in the opposite direction. Survive 30 challenging levels, dodge falling rockets, and collect coins to unlock new characters. All gun games on OnlineGames.io are free and playable right in your browser perfect for quick, commitment free sessions. Give it a try if you're up for another chaotic shooter!Embed URL:https://cloud.onlinegames.io/games/2025/construct/213/rooftop-duel/index-og.htmlThis article was updated on May 16, 20252 Player2DArcadeArenaCombatEmbeddableFreeFunGunMobilePhysicsShootingWeapon
